name: Space Wrangler
description: Space Wrangler is a dynamic space sandbox featuring multiple experiences designed to offer variety in gameplay. Experience the wonders and turmoil of Space as you traverse the cosmos as part of a new generation of explorers, frontiersmen, and cowboys.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Intel Core i3 (2.5GHz) + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Space Wrangler is in Early Access. Minimum specifications may change during development
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i7 (3.2GHz) + Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Space Wrangler is in Early Access. Recommended specifications may change during development.
